content.raw:
one more suggestion - `8` maps to thumb distal joint, maybe move that to `4`, and arrange 1~4 such that:

  - `1` - `right_thumb_cmc_ab_ad`
  - `2` - `right_thumb_cmc_fe`
  - `3` - `right_thumb_mcp`
  - `4` - `right_thumb_dip`
  - `5` ~ `8` - index, middle, ring, little finger mcp's
  - `9`, `0`, `-`, `=` - index, middle, ring, little finger ab-ad's
content.html:
one more suggestion - 8 maps to thumb distal joint, maybe move that to 4, and arrange 1~4 such that:

  • 1 - right_thumb_cmc_ab_ad
  • 2 - right_thumb_cmc_fe
  • 3 - right_thumb_mcp
  • 4 - right_thumb_dip
  • 5 ~ 8 - index, middle, ring, little finger mcp's
  • 9, 0, -, = - index, middle, ring, little finger ab-ad's
